question: A city had 45,321 trees. Due to deforestation, 8,125 trees were cut. Later, 9,000 trees were illegally removed. How many trees remain?
A factory produced 50,000 units of a product. Due to defects, 47,356 units were discarded. How many units are left?
A shopkeeper had 305 tomatoes. He sold 167 in the morning and later he saw 9 tomatoes were rotten. How many tomatoes are left?
A farmer harvested 834 apples. After selling some, 476 apples remained. How many apples were sold?
A store had 592 boxes of chocolates. It received 205 more, and now has 788 boxes. How many were sold?

A stadium sold 64,325 tickets for a football match. Due to a mistake, 2,756 duplicate tickets were counted with this. Additionally, 3,918 VIP tickets were issued separately. How many real tickets were sold?
Kim had some stamps. Kris gave him 4 more. Now Kim has 12 stamps. How many stamps did Kim have in the beginning?
A toy shop has 15,000 teddy bears. On Monday, 2500 were sold. On Tuesday, 5000 were sold. On Wednesday, 2500 were sold. How many teddy bears are left after Wednesday?
Alex has 24 socks. 12 of them are blue, and 12 of them are red. He loses 5 blue socks in the laundry. Then, he buys 8 more red socks. How many red socks does Alex have now?
Sarah had 21 flowers. She gave some to her friend. Now she has 8 flowers. How many did she give to her friend?

Liam baked 24 cookies and put them on the table. His little brother ate 6 cookies before dinner. Liamâ€™s mom baked 12 more cookies and added them to the table. The number of cookies on the table now is
Emma had 14 pencils in her pencil case. She gave 4 pencils to her friend Mia. Later, she found 3 more pencils under her desk and put them back in her case. The number of pencils in Emma's case is
There are 128 chairs in a school hall. Some students took away 39 chairs for an event. Later, the janitor brought back 15 chairs. What is the number of chairs in the hall now?
A birthday party had 74 guests. 24 people left early, but then 19 more arrived later. The number of guests present in the party now is
A bus started with 35 passengers. At the first stop, 8 people got off and 5 people got on. At the second stop, 6 more got off, but 5 got on. How many people are on the bus now?
